title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 611.5 - Departmental Advisory Committee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 611.5 - Departmental Advisory Committee

State Regulations

Commencing January 1, 1980, the
justices of the Appellate Division, First Department established a Departmental

Advisory Committee. This committee shall remain in operation and have the
authority and responsibility to oversee the operation of the Attorneys for

Children Plan and to consider all matters that pertain to the qualifications, performance and professional conduct of individual plan attorneys in their
assignments and appointments as plan attorneys, and the representation of
indigent parties in Family Court proceedings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
611.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
